meanings.definition: Make someone aware of or familiar with something.
meanings.sent1: I aquatinted my friend with the rules of the game.
meanings.sent2: She aquatinted herself with the new software.
meanings.sent3: The cat aquatinted itself with the new dog in the house.
meanings.sent4: The detective aquatinted himself with the crime scene.
meanings.sent5: The teacher aquatinted the students with the history of the ancient civilization.

meanings.definition: To have knowledge or experience of something.
meanings.sent1: He is aquatinted with the local customs.
meanings.sent2: She aquatinted herself with the taste of exotic fruits.
meanings.sent3: The robot aquatinted itself with the daily routine of the family.
meanings.sent4: The explorer aquatinted himself with the dangers of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The scientist aquatinted the team with the latest research findings.
